short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A straightforward tool for organizing your entire bookmark collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1. See all bookmarks neatly sorted into folders.
2. Easily add new bookmarks or folders to any category.
3. Quickly search through your bookmarks.
4. Edit or delete any of your saved bookmarks.
5. Delete specific bookmark folders you no longer need.
6. Check out your most recently added bookmarks.
